bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology
Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems
Local and Metropolitan Area Networks -- Specific Requirements -- Part 19: TV White Space Coexistence Methods

IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks -- Specific Requirements -- Part 19: TV White Space Coexistence Methods

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies radio 1 technology independent methods for coexistence among dissimilar TV Band Devices (TVBDs) and dissimilar or independently operated networks of TVBDs

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
